response_json.subject: Aerospace Engineering
response_json.question_text: Consider a 20 degree half-angle wedge in a supersonic flow at Mach 3.0 at standard sea-level conditions. If the shock-wave angle on the wedge is 36 degree, the Mach number of the tangential component of the flow post-shock is _______ (accurate to two decimal places).
